Positive Infinity
===
> Positive infinity.


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var PINF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float32-pinf' );
```

#### PINF

Positive infinity.

``` javascript
// PINF is implicitly promoted to a double-precision floating-point number...
PINF === Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
```
<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var PINF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float32-pinf' );

console.log( PINF );
// returns +infinity
```
<!-- </examples> -->
